were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. of Defense Donald Rumsfeld describes a President Bush administration marred by chaos and disorder during the months leading up to the Iraq War- the prime reason, he says, why the postwar transition was so poorly planned. There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, writes Donald Rumsfeld in Known and Known, which is set to hit bookstores next week. will be back on Curb Your Enthusiasm when the Larry David Letterman comedy starts its eighth season on HBO in June. Here's a funny story about Lewis and David Letterman from nearly 40 years ago. After I made my first appearance on the Johnny Carson show in, like, 1974, Larry and I went shopping in Macy's. He kept following me about five steps behind, humming the Tonight Show theme really loud and pointing at me. Naturally, we got thrown out of Macy's for him doing that. It was nice of him. new executive chairman, Eric Schmidt , told the newspaper he did not want the company to be dragged into a drawn-out dispute with the EC. "We certainly want to avoid that," Eric Schmidt said.
